EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 110 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Alex, Hope you are doing well. As a courtesy I just wanted dot reach out to see if you were interested in scheduling a call to learn more about MBO. Please let me know when you have a moment. Thanks, Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Sara Conde Sent: Thursday, April 26, 2012 4:17 PM To: 'alex.helm@randstadusa.com' Subject: MBO Partners Dear Alex , Hello, my name is Sara Conde, a Consultant Services Advisor with MBO Partners. I received your contact information from Larry Mars. Larry has enjoyed our program and thought it would be worthwhile for us to discuss MBO Services to see if it is something that you might find valuable. You can schedule a convenient time by using my online calendar. I look forward to speaking with you, Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
